response.original_title: The Life and Times of Foster & Allen
response.overview: The partnership of Foster & Allen has endured decades in the limelight. Celebrate the long-running musical group's success with this collection featuring footage and interviews as well as performances of their music, including "Everything Is Beautiful," "Partner in Rhyme," "Morning Has Broken," "From a Distance," "The Gypsy Rover," "You Stand Alone," "Lonely but Only for You," "Lord of the Dance," "Michael Row the Boat" and more.
response.title: The Life and Times of Foster & Allen
